message.body: So I think Richard and I are going to get into Pennsylvania on Sunday and he will stay until Monday. We could do Longwood Gardens Sunday evening.
It looks like only members can sign up to reserve a specific time in advance. So I couldn't tell which times are still available but maybe we
could do around 5 o'clock or so.
Members can reserve times for free. Abby one can buy timed tickets in advance on the site.
Ski gear and lift ticket give away http://bit.ly/GUFWmobile
Great! Check out my stats from yesterday and today on Facebook from my phone tracking app.
